title: What the Lightning Sees: Part Three
description: No longer for sale as individual novellas, however #1-3 are all available within Parisian Nights.Jake and Haven have finally found a way to be together. Haven realized that she is ready to trust Jake and wants to open up to him. For Jake, Haven isn’t an option, she’s not just another girl, she’s his future. He’s certain of that, or he was.Jake has been delivered life-changing news that he is yet to share with Haven. Will he confide in Haven and if he does, is their bond strong enough to withstand the bombshell?What the Lightning Sees Part Three is the final part in the series.Coming next: Ashleigh Franklin's story.
author: Louise Bay
